abstract: Church leaders said they support some anti-discrimination laws for gays and lesbians. But they also want to protect “religious freedom.”
snippet: Church leaders said they support some anti-discrimination laws for gays and lesbians. But they also want to protect “religious freedom.”

keywords.value: Mormons (Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints)
keywords.name: subject

headline.main: Mormon Church Wants Freedom to Discriminate
